field.label: Enable NRPE
field.help: This will activate the NRPE service.

field.label: Port
field.help: Set the port the daemon is listening to.

field.label: Listen Address
field.help: Set the address the daemon is listening to. Empty means listen to all addresses.

field.label: Allowed Hosts
field.help: Set the list of allowed hosts which can query this system.

field.label: Allow Arguments
field.help: Enable to allow arguments sent to NRPE. Enabling this option is a high security risk.

field.label: Allow Bash Substitutions
field.help: This option determines whether or not the NRPE daemon will allow clients to specify arguments that contain bash command substitutions of the form $(...). Enabling this option is a high security risk.

field.label: Command Timeout
field.help: This specifies the maximum number of seconds that the NRPE daemon will allow plugins to finish executing before killing them off.

field.label: Connection Timeout
field.help: This specifies the maximum number of seconds that the NRPE daemon will wait for a connection to be established before exiting.
